title: Chicago Kidnapping Broadcast On Facebook Live

organizations.name: chicago kidnapping broadcast on facebook live chicago kidnapping broadcast on facebook live

text: Chicago Kidnapping Broadcast On Facebook Live 5 hours ago share Video broadcast on Facebook Live depicts Brittany Herring and others allegedly tying-up, attacking, and cutting an unidentified white male. The group proceeds to taunt and torture the male screaming 'F**k Donald Trump, F**k white people' during the ordeal. The video is shocking and contains graphic language. Four people are currently in custody though no charges have been filed as of Wednesday evening. [ More details from Fox Chicago ]
